entry.title: [Worldwide][Dedicated Servers] - IPXE scripts migration
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 5, 09:00 - 09:45 UTC

Feb 6, 23:27 UTC
Scheduled - Start time :05/03/2024 09:00 UTC
End time : 05/03/2024 09:45 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy about IPXE (open-source implementation of the Preboot eXecution Environment), the following API calls will be definitely removed:
POST /me/ipxeScript
PUT /me/ipxeScript/{name}
Customers can still use that feature by using the "bootScript" key within the PUT /dedicated/server/{serviceName} API call: see documentation for more details.

Jan 14, 10:19 UTC

New End time : 15/02/2024 06:00 UTC

Jan 5, 03:50 UTC

End time : 15/02/2024 06:00 UTC

entry.title: [RBX][Storage and Backups] - NAS HA maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 14, 08:30 - 10:30 UTC

Feb 3, 04:25 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 14/02/2024 08:30 UTC
End time : 14/02/2024 10:30 UTC
Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : AAs part of our NAS-HA hosting responsibilities, we will perform infrastructure maintenance.
The maintenance will update the storage servers that host your data.
This release will improve certain security mechanisms as well as some performance improvements.
Your data will remain available during the maintenance period.
